name: Great Wall Club
description: A mobile internet industry trade Org.
overview: The Great Wall Club (GWC) is an industry trade organization focused on the rapidly growing mobile internet market. GWC is the organizer of the annual Global Mobile Internet Conference in Beijing, which draws over a 1000 executives from more than 20 countries. GWC seeks to develop a more innovative and competitive landscape in the mobile internet industry through events, executive trips, reports, consulting and investing. The 70+ members of GWC are exclusively top executives from leading mobile internet companies in China and abroad such as Tencent, Alibaba and China Unicom. The Great Wall Club is headquartered in Beijing and has representative offices in Japan, USA, Singapore and Finland.

offices.address1: Room 902, YinGu Building, No. 9 West Road, BeiSiHuan, Haidian District
